main_address_raw_text: 221 w chestnut st, rogers, arkansas, 72756, united states
locations: us, united states, arkansas, rogers, 72756, west chestnut street, 221, 36.3344335, -94.1182416
short_description: newton owen boyd & smoke ltd. is an accounting & bookkeeping services company based in rogers, arkansas, united states.
long_description:
welcome to the rogers office of newton, owen, boyd & smoke, ltd. while the name may be unfamiliar to some of you in northwest arkansas, neither the firm or the office is new. newton, owen, boyd & smoke was formed in 1952 in pine bluff and has grown into a full service accounting firm serving clients throughout the state. we have offices in pine bluff, white hall, and now rogers. the rogers office was formed in 2014 with the purchase of the local practice of clarence guinn, cpa. clarence, who is well known throughout rogers and nwa, has been serving clients with top notch expertise and service for over 40 years. robert porter joined the firm in july 2016 and now serves as the managing cpa of the rogers office. he has over 30 years of experience in business accounting, tax preparation, business management, and financial analysis. he is actively accepting new clients. the staff in the rogers office includes:robert porter, cpa
clarence guinn, cpa
terri harkins, receptionist and accounting assistant
debi guinn, accounting staff
business_tags: financial analysis | financial services | accounting | business tax preparation | accounting & management | full service accounting
